content: Subzone of Kallang Planning Area in Central Region, Singapore **Boon Keng** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 文庆, [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language): பூன் கெங்) is a subzone within the planning area of [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), as defined by the [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority) (URA). The smallest in terms of physical area among the nine subzones that make up Kallang, Boon Keng is bounded by the [Pelton Canal](/wiki/Kallang_River#Pelton_Canal) in the north; the [Kallang–Paya Lebar Expressway](/wiki/Kallang%E2%80%93Paya_Lebar_Expressway) (KPE) and Sims Way in the east; [Sims Avenue](/wiki/Sims_Avenue) in the south; and the [Kallang River](/wiki/Kallang_River) in the west. Primarily a prime residential area, this area is served by [Boon Keng MRT station](/wiki/Boon_Keng_MRT_station) along the [North East Line](/wiki/North_East_Line) and [Kallang MRT station](/wiki/Kallang_MRT_station) along the [East–West Line](/wiki/East%E2%80%93West_Line_(Singapore)). A plot of land at Lorong 3 Geylang is slated for future development into a new residential precinct. Geylang West Community Club is located within this subzone. This area took its name from Dr [Lim Boon Keng](/wiki/Lim_Boon_Keng), a prominent figure in Singapore history. - [Lim Boon Keng](/wiki/Lim_Boon_Keng) Media related to Kallang Planning Area at Wikimedia Commons This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Boon Keng
